movie.title: Burning Shadow
movie.description_intro: Charlie, a down-on-his-luck loner obsessed with a Russian stripper, crosses paths with a blind homeless man who is his exact double. Perplexed and intrigued by the discovery, Charlie invites the man into his life.
movie.description_full: Charlie, a down-on-his-luck loner obsessed with a Russian stripper, crosses paths with a blind homeless man who is his exact double. Perplexed and intrigued by the discovery, Charlie invites the man into his life.

movies.title: Code Unknown
movies.summary: Jean, a farm lad, wants to escape his silent father; he runs to Paris to his older brother, Georges, who's away covering the war in Kosovo. Angry, he throws a bag of half-eaten pastry into a beggar's lap. Amadou, a young Franco-African, berates him. The police arrive, arrest Amadou and deport the beggar. Georges's girlfriend Anne is upset; it colors her relationship with Georges when he returns from the war. Separate lives intersect for the one moment, around the pastry bag, and all are altered. We follow each as repercussions of the incident play out. Deaf children bookend the film pantomiming words, feelings, and situations: what they are expressing?
movies.description_full: Jean, a farm lad, wants to escape his silent father; he runs to Paris to his older brother, Georges, who's away covering the war in Kosovo. Georges's girlfriend Anne is upset; it colors her relationship with Georges when he returns from the war. Separate lives intersect for the one moment, around the pastry bag, and all are altered. We follow each as repercussions of the incident play out. Deaf children bookend the film pantomiming words, feelings, and situations: what they are expressing?

movies.title: Beck Utan uppsåt
movies.summary: Alex is hired as the new investigation team leader. Steinar wanted the job. Maria finds her mom dead. The mom's ex/Maria's dad and boyfriend are main suspects, but the list gets longer. Beck's a near cameo.
movies.description_full: Alex is hired as the new investigation team leader. Steinar wanted the job. Maria finds her mom dead. The mom's ex/Maria's dad and boyfriend are main suspects, but the list gets longer. Beck's a near cameo.
movies.synopsis: Alex is hired as the new investigation team leader. Steinar wanted the job. Maria finds her mom dead. The mom's ex/Maria's dad and boyfriend are main suspects, but the list gets longer. Beck's a near cameo.

movies.title: Edward II
movies.summary: In this Derek Jarman version of Christopher Marlowe's Elizabethan drama, in modern costumes and settings, Plantagenet king Edward II hands the power-craving nobility the perfect excuse by taking as lover besides his diplomatic wife, the French princess Isabel, not an acceptable lady at court but the ambitious Piers Gaveston, who uses his favor in bed even to wield political influence - the stage is set for a palace revolt which sends the gay pair from the throne to a terminal torture dungeon.

movies.title: The Chocolate War
movies.summary: A surreal portrait of a Catholic Private School and its hierarchy. A new student must submit to the bizarre rituals of his peers and the expectations of the school's administration by selling chocolates.
movies.description_full: A surreal portrait of a Catholic Private School and its hierarchy. A new student must submit to the bizarre rituals of his peers and the expectations of the school's administration by selling chocolates.
